thread.title: BRIEF-Netlist Receives Initial Determination In International Trade Commission Investigation Of SK Hynix

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Netlist Receives Initial Determination In International Trade Commission Investigation Of SK Hynix

organizations.name: international trade commission investigation of sk hynix

text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Netlist Inc:
* NETLIST RECEIVES INITIAL DETERMINATION IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE COMMISSION INVESTIGATION OF SK HYNIX
* NETLIST INC - ALJ PENDER GRANTED SK HYNIXâ€™S MOTION FOR SUMMARY DETERMINATION OF NON-INFRINGEMENT AND TERMINATED 1089 INVESTIGATION
* NETLIST INC - INTENDS TO FILE PETITION BY END OF MONTH REQUESTING COMMISSIONERS REVIEW FINDINGS IN INITIAL DETERMINATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
